about.me: ADAreactor is an American â€“ Ukrainian family run. As a family, we are strong believers and supporters of the Cardano philosophy. Our goals: high-performance, decentralization, and minimal fees. Thank you for staking with us!
about.server: Powerful hardware is prioritized higher than low costs. All sensitive keys are stored and handled on a dedicated offline computer, ensuring complete safety of the pool. Dedicated servers, AMD Ryzen 5 5600G, DDR4 16GB 3200MHz, SSD 250GB. Hosted in Mariupol 1Gb up/down.
